product_name: The North Face Sashanna Softshell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Sashanna Softshell jacket for women is styled for urban outings. With an extended length and windproof fabric, this jacket is great for any occasion. Apex ClimateBlock windproof fabric features built-in stretch that moves with you; adjustable, built-in belt lets you cinch in the waist for a feminine fit. Detachable hood can be adjusted with drawcords for a dialed-in fit; 2-way front zipper lets you ventilate the top or the bottom of the jacket. Napolean chest pocket with headphone port; 2 hand pockets; zips at cuffs. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Sashanna Softshell jacket for women is styled for urban outings. With an extended length and windproof fabric, this jacket is great for any occasion.
